thread.title: BRIEF-Boston Properties Announces New Project Virginia

title: BRIEF-Boston Properties Announces New Project Virginia

organizations.name: brief-boston properties announces new project virginia re
brief-boston properties announces new project virginia

text: February 28, 2018 / 9:17 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Boston Properties Announces New Project Virginia Reuters Staff Feb 28 (Reuters) - Boston Properties Inc: * BOSTON PROPERTIES ANNOUNCES NEW PROJECT IN RESTON, VIRGINIA * BOSTON PROPERTIES INC - ‍ENTERED INTO A BINDING LEASE AGREEMENT WITH FANNIE MAE AT ITS RESTON GATEWAY PROJECT IN RESTON, VIRGINIA​ * BOSTON PROPERTIES - ‍FANNIE MAE TO LEASE ABOUT 850,000 RENTABLE SQUARE FEET OUT OF ABOUT 1 MILLION RENTABLE SQUARE FEET TO BE CONSTRUCTED ON PROPERTY​ * BOSTON PROPERTIES INC - ‍FANNIE MAE INTENDS TO OCCUPY BUILDINGS BEGINNING IN 2022​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
